moves.1. e4: This is a game in a tournament which I played in. Hope you enjoy it.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Nf6: The 2 knights. Usually black either plays this or Be7.
moves.4. Nc3: An unexplained move. I was sure not expecting this. If she wanted to play 4 knights, then she should have played Nc3 before Bc4.
moves.4... Bc5: Yes most people will argue to go Nx34 right now, but i prefer going into a game where you have all the pieces so you can attack more.
moves.5. O-O O-O 6. h3: A very bad move. D3 is so much better.
moves.6... d6 7. d3 h6: I really don't like the pin on g5 so i block it.
moves.9. a4: A very bad move again. It does nothing and is just a lost tempo.
moves.10. Bd2 Kh8 11. Ne2 f5 12. c3 fxe4 13. d: A move that she missed. It earns me a pawn.
moves.14. Bxh6: The worst move i ever seen. She probably didn't know what I was doing, so she went the same move.
moves.14... gxh6 15. gxh3 Rxf3: So now I got a free piece.
moves.16. Ng3: Another blunder. She doesn't see the pin by my bishop.
